description: "This map of Asia, from an atlas by the German cartographer Karl von Spruner, is colour-coded to show territorial regions in Asia towards the middle of the fifth century. Borneo is labelled ‘Kalemantan’, and Sulawasi is labelled ‘Mangkassar’."
title: "Asien   gegen   die   Mitte   des   Fünften   Jahrhunderts   …      (Asia   towards   the   middle   of   the   fifth   century)"
